arguments.hypothesis: The bug is caused by the Range constructor at line 455 in BorderArrangement.java having the lower bound greater than the upper bound. Adjusting the arguments of the Range constructor to ensure the lower bound is less than or equal to the upper bound will fix the issue.

modifications.modified_line: new Range(Math.min(0.0, constraint.getWidth() - w[2]), Math.max(0.0, constraint.getWidth() - w[2])),

arguments.reason: All test cases passed after fixing the Range constructor issue.
